I work with

A short description of what I do

Front-End Development

I develop websites based on the latest technologies and trends. I make sure that my websites are fast, safe and mobile-friendly.

WordPress Development

I create websites based on content management system - WordPress. Adding content yourself on such a site does not require any technical knowledge.

e-Commerce Websites

I create fully functional online stores with a modern design that helps achieve good sales results. I configure payment and delivery methods.

On-Page SEO

I take care of many elements of the website in terms of Search Engine Optimization. This is crucial in achieving a high position on Google.

My workflow

I would like to show you how I'm working

I

Planning

After reviewing your needs, I will prepare a comprehensive site plan. I will present an initial vision of the appearance and functioning of the website. I will analyze SEO and prepare an action plan in this area.

II

Consultation

After presenting my website plan, we will discuss to define the final project plan. The feedback obtained at this stage of the work will be extremely important in the further development process.

III

Coding

When I know your expectations and create a project plan, I will start working. I will prepare the website code that defines how it looks like and how it works.

IV

Testing

After creating the website, I will conduct the necessary tests to be sure of the quality of the service provided. If you like, I will advise you on the choice of hoshing and transfer it for you.

The Effect

The result of the process described above is a website that is user-friendly and does well in the fight for ranking on Google. This will allow you to achieve your goals easier.
